TopicTitle: [Editor Bug] - Moving the vessel let it disappear

Articles.Content:
This is the second time this issue happend. First time was in sandbox so i didn't care. This time i added some parts in the middle section of the rocket. So the bottom and the launch clamps were under the floor of the VAB. I allways grab the whole craft with shift-click and move it up with the mousewheel. After the shift-click the craft disappeard an KSP stuttered. After opening the debug toolbar i found it is spamming Errors due to NANs.

(It may be that the shift-click has nothing to do with it and that it would also disappear whem moving it through the root part.)

I allready have the KSP-log (8.5MB!) and Output_log (18.25MB!) on dropbox for the mods.

KSP Version: v1.0.5.1028 Windows7, updated from v1.0.5.1024 (clean install)

What Happens: When moving the whole craft in the Editor with shift-click (and maybe camera rotation) it disappears. KSP spams the log.

Mods / Add-Ons: All Stock

Steps to Replicate:

I am not sure about this yet. It happened twice to me, once in SPH and once in VAB.

I will try a few things.

Result:

-Craft is no longer visible

-Camera makes quick turn

-KSP spams the log

Fixes/Workarounds:

-ctrl-z after KSP is responding again
